faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM, and Saturday from 10 AM to 4 PM. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com, by phone at 1-800-123-4567, or through our live chat on the website.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. To initiate a return, please contact our customer support team with your order number.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Order History' section. You'll also receive a tracking link via email once your order has shipped.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right of our website. Fill in your email address, create a password, and provide your basic information. You'll receive a confirmation email to verify your account.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your registered email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. The link expires in 24 hours.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. You can see the shipping options at checkout.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, express shipping takes 2-3 business days, and overnight shipping delivers the next business day. International shipping typically takes 10-15 business days.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All personal information is encrypted using SSL technology, and we never share your data with third parties without your consent.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it by going to 'Order History' and clicking 'Cancel Order'. After this window, please contact customer support for assistance.

faqs.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our rewards program lets you earn points on every purchase. For every dollar spent, you earn 1 point. 100 points equals $5 off your next purchase. Sign up for free in your account settings.

faqs.question: What if my item arrives damaged?
faqs.answer: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please take photos of the damaged item and packaging, then contact our customer support within 48 hours. We'll arrange a replacement or full refund.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
faqs.answer: You can update your shipping address within 1 hour of placing your order through 'Order History'. After that, please contact customer support immediately, though we cannot guarantee changes if the order has already shipped.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional $5 per item. You can select this option at checkout. We also offer the option to include a personalized gift message.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: Enter your discount code in the 'Promo Code' field at checkout and click 'Apply'. The discount will be reflected in your order total. Note that only one discount code can be used per order.

faqs.question: What is your price match policy?
faqs.answer: We offer price matching within 14 days of purchase if you find the same item at a lower price from an authorized retailer. Contact customer support with proof of the lower price.

faqs.question: How do I leave a product review?
faqs.answer: After receiving your order, you'll get an email inviting you to review your purchase. You can also leave reviews by visiting the product page and clicking 'Write a Review' while logged in.

faqs.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android. Download it from the App Store or Google Play Store to shop on the go and receive exclusive mobile-only deals.

faqs.question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
faqs.answer: You can unsubscribe by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any of our emails, or by updating your email preferences in your account settings.
